name: External Disk Drive Or USB Storage Device
description: Detects external diskdrives or plugged in USB devices , EventID 6416 on windows 10 or later
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND ((event.code:6416 AND winlog.event_data.ClassName:DiskDrive) OR winlog.event_data.DeviceDescription:USB\ Mass\ Storage\ Device))`
